text: Leonard Hubert "Lennie" Hoffmann, Baron Hoffmann, PC, GBS (born 8 May 1934) is a retired senior South African-British judge. He was a Lord of Appeal in Ordinary from 1995 to 2009. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:South African politicians Category:People from Cape Town Category:Law lords
title: Lennie Hoffmann, Baron Hoffmann
